termsAndConditionsDescription: By making a reservation with PLAN A, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
termsAndConditionsDescription1: I have read and accept the terms and conditions and the privacy policy.
newsletterDescription: I want to receive offers and news about activities in Bariloche.
reviewValue: Excellent experience with Carlos. Very professional and knowledgeable about the area. The activity exceeded our expectations. Totally recommended!
joinOurCommunity: Join our community of certified guides and share your experiences with travelers from all over the world.
publishYourActivities: Publish your activities as a guide
termsAndConditionsDescription: Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before continuing.
termsAndConditionsDescription1: I have read and accept the terms and conditions and the privacy policy.
termsAndConditionsDescription2: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF PROVIDING SERVICES AS A GUIDE IN "PLAN A"
termsAndConditionsDescription3: By registering as a Guide of Activities on the "Plan A" platform, you, hereafter "the Guide", agree to the following terms and conditions, which regulate the relationship between Plan A (hereafter "the Company") and the Guide.
termsAndConditionsDescription4: The Guide commits to offering their professional services in tourist activities (such as trekking, cycling, kitesurfing, climbing, skiing, among others) through the "Plan A" platform, according to the quality, safety and experience standards defined by the Company.
termsAndConditionsDescription5: The Guide will be fully responsible for the safety, quality and compliance of the activities offered. The Guide assumes responsibility for carrying out the activities with due care and diligence, following all safety regulations, and will be responsible for any incident or damage that occurs during the provision of their services.
termsAndConditionsDescription6: The Guide expressly exonerates the Company from any liability derived from the services provided. The Company acts solely as a platform for intermediation between the Guide and the consumer. Any claim, demand or action related to the services provided will be exclusively between the Guide and the consumer.
termsAndConditionsDescription7: The Guide, by accepting these terms and conditions, waives any legal action, demand or claim against the Company in relation to the provision of their services. The Guide acknowledges that the Company is not responsible for incidents that occur during the execution of the activities, and that any dispute related to the services provided should be resolved directly between the Guide and the consumer.
termsAndConditionsDescription8: The Guide commits to maintaining the necessary civil liability and personal accident insurance and to having the corresponding professional qualification to exercise as a guide of the tourist activities in which they register. The Guide must present an updated copy of their liability insurance policy and professional certifications to the Company before starting to provide services through the platform.
termsAndConditionsDescription9: The Guide commits to indemnify and keep the Company indemnified against any claim, demand or damage derived from negligence or error in the exercise of their functions, which affects the Company or third parties, including consumers.
termsAndConditionsDescription10: The Guide may terminate their relationship with the Company at any time by written notice. The Company may terminate the Guide's access to the platform if they fail to fulfill any of the obligations mentioned in this agreement.
termsAndConditionsDescription11: By registering and accepting to be part of the "Plan A" platform, the Guide declares that they have read, understood and accepted these terms and conditions, and commit to comply with the safety, service and responsibility policies defined by the Company.
uploadCertifications: Upload your certifications in PDF or image format
termsAndConditionsDescription_3_2: Exoneration of Responsibility of the Company
termsAndConditionsDescription_4_2: Renunciation of Legal Actions against "Plan A"

thisWillHelpGuides: This will help guides and other users recognize you
name: Name
addCard: Add a card to speed up your reservations
yourInformationIsSafe: Your information is safe and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.

platformResponsibilityDescription: The "PLAN A" platform acts solely as an intermediary between users (consumers) and service providers of tourist activities (guides). "PLAN A" does not assume any responsibility for accidents, damages or losses that may arise as a result of the execution of activities contracted through the platform.
providerResponsibilityDescription: The service providers (guides) are responsible for the correct execution of the activities they offer on the platform, as well as for compliance with the safety, permits, licenses and insurance requirements imposed by the current legislation in the Province of Río Negro and the applicable national regulations. The providers must have civil liability and personal accident insurance that covers any incident during the activity.
userResponsibilityDescription: The user is responsible for following the instructions of the guide and complying with the safety conditions required for each activity. The user acknowledges that the activities offered on the platform may involve inherent risks, such as injuries or damage to property, and accepts to participate in them at their own risk.
platformExonerationDescription: The user understands and accepts that "PLAN A" is not responsible for any injury, damage, loss, theft, accident or any other loss that may occur during the execution of activities contracted through the platform. The user accepts that any claim related to accidents or damages derived from activities will be exclusively directed to the service provider.
responsibilityInsuranceDescription: It is recommended that users contract an additional personal insurance to cover risks that are not covered by the service provider's insurance. "PLAN A" is not responsible for the lack of coverage or any uncovered loss by the service provider's insurance.
additionalConsiderationsDescription: The user understands and accepts that "PLAN A" is not responsible for any injury, damage, loss, theft, accident or any other loss that may occur during the execution of activities contracted through the platform. The user accepts that any claim related to accidents or damages derived from activities will be exclusively directed to the service provider.
additionalConsiderationsDescription2: Consent informed: Before completing any reservation, the user must explicitly accept this responsibility clause, which implies that they have read and understood the inherent risks of the activities to be carried out. This informed consent is a requirement to be able to complete the process of contracting the activity through the platform.
pleaseReadTermsAndConditions: Please read the following terms and conditions carefully before continuing.
nextStepsDescription1: 1. Verify your email to confirm your reservation.
nextStepsDescription2: 2. Review the details of your reservation in the confirmation email.
nextStepsDescription3: 3. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact the guide.
requestSentDescription: Your request to become a guide has been sent. We will contact you soon to coordinate the process.
about_Value: Mountain guide certified with more than 10 years of experience in the Patagonian Andes. Specialized in trekking, climbing and mountaineering. Passionate about sharing the natural beauty of Bariloche with visitors from all over the world.
